headline: BEST IN THE WESTFamily goes beyond blood for SGA. It powered OKC to NBA Finals.Being a husband and father has revealed what "matters in life" to Shai Gilgeous-Alexander. But team is also family, and his love was evident in propelling the Thunder to the NBA Finals.
